name: AnalogyGame
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: analogy game
des:
Analogies are used on some tests for Gifted and Talented programs. Give your kid an advantage!

This skill asks 5 analogy questions of the form: "A is to B as C is to ...?"

The user listens to a list of four words and speaks the number that corresponds to the word that satisfies the analogy.
